channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Wisconsin police chief overseeing school shooting probe is named to Seattle job
item.description: The Madison, Wisconsin, police chief has been named as the chief of police in Seattle. Friday’s announcement comes five days after he was thrust into the national spotlight because of a school shooting in Madison that killed a teacher and student.

item.title: Trump wants debt ceiling in the budget deal. If not, he says let the government shutdown start now
Senate set to approve 235th judge of Biden’s term, beating Trump’s tally
